author: Igor Isaev
content:
There is no virus. There is no pandemic. We demand the International Tribunal. COVID-19 VIRUS DOESN ' T EXIST
China lied for a whole year about being able to highlight the new coronavirus. The truth has come out. Dr. Wu Junwu from the ′′ China Center for Disease Control ′′ admitted to NBC reporter that they couldn't highlight the SARS-CoV-2 virus resulting from Covid-19. [1] This story was published on January 23 2021 years (from 13 min 30 sec). [2] On January 27  Dr. Wu Junw was highlighted by the host of the Aaron O channel. ′′ I just came across this extremely important interview. It turns out that the Chinese failed to allocate SARS-COV-2. This means that no one has evidence that the Covid-19 virus exists." (from 19 seconds) [3] Earlier  the US Center for Disease Control (CDC) also acknowledged  has no SARS-CoV-2. virus [4] Together with China  WHO officials participated in fraud. They lied twice saying
• that the SARS-CoV-2 virus causes COVID-19 
• that the SARS-CoV-2 virus was highlighted by Chinese scientists. [5] Doctor of virology and immunology Joe Rizoli in the article ′′ Covid-19 is a Deception ′′ writes: ′′ Our lab tested 1500 samples using a scanning electronic microscope  we didn't find Covid in any of them. The vast majority of samples were A flu  some were B flu  and not a single case of Covid. We sent the remaining samples to Stanford  Cornell and California universities. They got the same results. Then we turned to the US Center for Disease Control for Covid samples. They replied that they did not have such samples. After doing laboratory research  we came to a firm conclusion that Covid-19 is a fiction. Covid-19 is just a new name for the flu. Most of the ′′ Covid-19 victims ′′ have died from related diseases after the flu weakened their immune system. This happens every year." [6] Doctor of Medicine Thomas Cowan exposes CDC research on the SARS-CoV-2 virus: ′′ Instead of isolating the virus and analyzing the genome from end to end  they were limited to 37 pairs of grounds from unauthorized samples using PCR probes. In fact  they have only considered 37 pairs of grounds that are alleged to be the genome of the virus. Then they took these 37 segments and put them in a computer program that filled the rest of the grounds. In other words  sequencing of the SARS-CoV-2 virus was made based on assumptions and arbitrary conclusions. If it's science  then a penguin is a spaceship. The creation of viruses on a computer is scientific fraud. Imagine a group of researchers who claim to have discovered a unicorn because they found a piece of hoof  a piece of horn  and tail hair. They put this information in the computer and program it to recreate the unicorn  then claim this computer model is a real unicorn. They've never seen a unicorn  so they can't compare the genetic composition of their samples to a real unicorn." [7] Ireland's public sued the government in December 2020 The government had to admit that it has no scientific evidence of the existence of the SARS-CoV-2 virus: ′′ In the framework of the lawsuit  we demanded scientific evidence that
• that the virus exists 
• that blocking and distancing contain the spread of the virus 
• that face masks are safe and contain the spread of the virus. As it turns out  such research does not exist." [8] THE PANDEMIC IS A FRAUD
In November 2020  researcher Ian Davis spread an article from the Spanish medical magazine ′′ D-Salud-Discovery ′′ that no test is able to identify the SARS-CoV-2. virus today [5] A study by a group of 22 scientists (including Mike Yidon  former Vice President of Faiser) showed a complete unfitness of the Korman-Drosten protocol on using the PCR test to detect the SARS-CoV-2. virus. The protocol developers did not have at their disposal The SARS-CoV-2 virus was based exclusively on theoretical assumption. This was acknowledged by the author of the protocol - Prof. Christian Drosten. [10] Lawyer Rainer Fullmih  one of the founders of the Coronavirus scam Investigation Commission  believes that the introduction of anti-coronavirus measures that led the world to disaster has become possible thanks to fraud with PCR tests. The lawyer suggests lawyers preparing compensation lawsuits  not to overload their applications with unnecessary details and beat only PCR tests  seek fraud in courts. [10] Additional evidence of the absence of the pandemic was the 2020 mortality statistics in Sweden  which did not impose restrictions. [9] The Covid-19 pandemic  measured by unfit PCR tests  is the largest fraud in history. INTERNATIONAL TRIBUNAL ON PANDEMIC CASE
A short list of crimes in the Pandemic case includes: • Announcing a pandemic based on a non-existent virus.
• Forcing states to introduce quarantine restrictions and stop economies.
• Psychological terror aimed at scaring people.
• Forcing people to self-isolate  wearing masks  passing tests and vaccination. The pandemic is a crime against humanity without statute of limitations. Participants of this crime should be punished. Yakov Dzhugashvili on the TV channel ′′ Stalingrad ′′ called for the creation of an International Tribunal to investigate and punish criminals who organized the ′′ pandemic ". [11] * * *
The post is based on Edward Dauvalter's publication: https://aizen-tt.livejournal.com/2969248.html I recommend Yakov Dzhugashvili's video channel: https://vidio.blog/@jugashvili Links
